rescuecore2.log

Interface LogWriter

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractLogWriter, FileLogWriter, StreamLogWriter

    public interface LogWriter
    An interface for objects that know how to write log entries.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Close the log.
      void writeRecord(LogRecord entry)
      Write a log entry.

    • Method Detail

      • writeRecord

        void writeRecord(LogRecord entry)
                 throws LogException
        Write a log entry.
        Parameters:
        entry - The entry to write.
        Throws:
        LogException - If there is a problem writing the log.

      • close

        void close()
        Close the log.
